title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, and other GGUF models locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—chat, generate, pull, and embed from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library exposing chat, generate, pull, push, list, delete, and embeddings endpoints.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as an LLM and ChatModel for chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat history, multi-model support, code highlighting, RAG via uploaded docs.

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI with tab completion, chat sessions, and prompt templates for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot (sammcj/ollama-copilot)
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code completions.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local PDFs and Markdown files.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive (WebFlux) support.

title: ollama-rs (pepperoni21/ollama-rs)
summary: Rust crate providing async/await bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio and Serde.

title: ollama-npm (npm search)
summary: Registry listing 30+ community packages: ollama-node, ollama-chat, ollama-rag, ollama-cli, etc.

title: ollama-pypi (pypi search)
summary: PyPI index showing official ollama package plus 20+ community libraries like ollama-rag, ollama-async, ollama-embed.

title: ollama-discord-bot (dannyhp/ollama-discord-bot)
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama model responses into Discord threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot (rikkikang/ollama-slack-bot)
summary: Bolt-js Slack bot that lets teams chat with local Ollama models in channels or DMs.

title: ollama-helm (otw/ollama-helm)
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU node selector.

title: ollama-docker (ollama/ollama-docker)
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & CUDA) with docker-compose examples for persistent model storage.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/haystack-ollama)
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack 2.0 pipelines.

title: ollama-rust-candle (EricLBuehler/ollama-rust-candle)
summary: Experimental Rust inference backend for Ollama using Candle for GPU-accelerated local serving.

title: ollama-streamlit (trelles/ollama-streamlit)
summary: Streamlit chat UI that connects to Ollama via REST with session memory and model switcher.

title: ollama-reddit discussion
summary: Reddit thread announcing Gemma 1.1 and Llama-3 8B Instruct support in Ollama with benchmarks.
